review_content: Can in Busan. Artificial Mango nose - Like Fanta Mango. Smooth sweetish beginning. A bit watery, not too deep in flavour, not too sweetish. Sessionable, mild but in total too much sweet Mango aroma. But nice and highly drinkable.

355 ml can bought at Wellcome Superstore in Sheung Shui.



Translucent pale dull golden colour; Half finger head with soapy white foam which fades in 20 seconds; Very good sticky lacing and notable carbonation; Very sweet aroma of mango pulp, lychee, perfume, canned fruit syrup, and very light malt; Medium sweet taste of fair malt, with rice, strong mango juice, carbo, floral, and sugar; Mid to light body. Slick palate; Mouth feel is more like a Radler - half ricey macro Pale and half mango juice, which is so strong you can’t taste any residual hops from the cheap Hite beer. Sugary sweet, but fruit-wise it taste much stronger than most mango-themed fruit beers. Sorta okay… No hoppiness or bitterness whatsoever, just sweet juicey finish; Wet after taste. Very easy to mouth.



Comments: The overload of mango - real or not - in aroma and taste gives the pretty cheap Hite beer base a spark, so this is not much a fruit beer, more like a beer-juice mix, could have been good if only sweetness can be toned down.
맥주보다 칵테일에 가깝다. 그것이 의도이기 때문에 잘 만들었다고 본다. 여름 바캉스를 갔을 때, 술을 잘 마시지는 못하지만 분위기를 맞추며 술 한잔하고 싶은 분들에게 정말 좋을 것이다. 맥주의 강한 과일향과 단 맛을 꺼리는 분들에게는 추천하기 힘들다. 가볍게 즐기는 자리에서 적절하다.
